DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Lowest Level Prostate-Specific Antigen Result Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to indicate the date on which a laboratory sample used to determine the value related to the medical procedure that involves the lowest level of a sample of blood serum for a tissue kallikrein-related sequence enzyme used as a biomarker for prostate cancer was obtained.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Lowest Level Prostate-Specific Antigen Result
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood or tissue for the lowest level of kallikrein-related sequence enzyme used as a biomarker for prostate cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity.:A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.  (NCI):Alternate isoforms of the single-chain 261-aa 30-kD Kallikrein 3 (Prostate Specific Antigen) glycoprotein precursor are encoded by human KLK3 Gene (Kallikrein Family). Frameshifted isoform 2 has a shorter distinct C-terminus. A serine protease in seminal plasma, PSA may function in liquefaction of seminal coagulum by (preferential Tyr-X) cleavage of seminal vesicle protein. Kallikrein proteases have diverse functions. Mounting evidence implicates kallikreins in carcinogenesis; some have potential as cancer biomarkers. The serum level of PSA is useful in diagnosis and monitoring of prostatic carcinoma. (from LocusLink, Swiss-Prot, OMIM, and NCI):Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity.
A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.
Prostate-specific antigen (261 aa, ~29 kDa) is encoded by the human KLK3 gene. This protein plays a role in both proteolysis and seminal fluid liquefaction.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: revised relationship to EVS terminology.  **Laboratory Clean-Up**

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
